ygData.subject: Re: EQ Update
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t flirt because this is just a game to me, but for some reason, when other characters find out that I am really a woman, they want to know more about me
ygData.messageBody:
I don't flirt because this is just a game to me, but for some reason,
when other characters find out that I am really a woman, they want to
know more about me (i.e. where I am from, how old I am, do I have a
boyfriend, can I be their girlfriend, etc.). I get this often too. I
usually just tell them that my boyfriend plays the game and I already
have a partner (even though he quit playing) because it's easier than
dealing with all these personal questions from strangers. My boyfriend
tells me that it's because they think it's great to meet an actual woman
gamer. Isn't this interesting?

-Sarah
